author: Ellen Ormesher
description:
Norwegian oil company Equinor is spending more than £200,000 to sponsor science classrooms in the Shetland Islands, as it seeks approval for plans to develop the vast Rosebank oilfield 80 miles off the coast. Opponents of Rosebank — the largest new oil and gas field in the North Sea — have accused Equinor of using […]

The post Shetland Schoolchildren Study in Classrooms Sponsored by Norwegian Oil Giant appeared first on DeSmog.
title: Shetland Schoolchildren Study in Classrooms Sponsored by Norwegian Oil Giant
